titles.title: Honoring the life and recognizing the accomplishments of civil rights leader J.L. Chestnut, Jr.
Honoring the life and recognizing the accomplishments of civil rights leader J.L. Chestnut, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives to the surviving family of J.L. Chestnut, Jr.
Honors the life of J.L. Chestnut, Jr., as a recognized leader and powerful advocate for justice and equality.
